title: Can we get a ghost type champion?
body: Seems like riot has released all different kinds of champs over the years stemming from all kinds of mythological backgrounds. I just think they haven't really touched upon phantoms as much. There's nocturne but he's a nightmare not a ghost or a wraith. Riot please start working on a specter-like champ soon.

replies.body:
{{champion:56}} ghost/dark
{{champion:32}} ghost/ground
{{champion:9}} ghost/grass
{{champion:429}} ghost
{{champion:30}} ghost/dark
{{champion:111}} ghost/water
{{champion:82}} ghost/steel
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
i meant someone more like casper the friendly ghost lol

{{champion:30}} Lich
{{champion:412}} Ghost warden
{{champion:555}} Ghost of the drowned
{{champion:82}} Metal Ghost/Lich
{{champion:9}} Ghost in a scarcrow
{{champion:429}} Ghost of the betrayed
{{champion:56}} Ghost/Nightmare
{{champion:111}} Ghost of the drowned
If there's a champ type we don't have it's a goblin, and it's shameful we're in Leagues 49th year without any representation.
